Articles.Content:
![yi8GIIHl.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/yi8GIIHl.jpg)

Well it is reasonable. The color scheme seems fitting with pistachios.

So can we conclude pistachios are #bada55 ? ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

Discuss!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-16T00:27:41Z" title="04/16/2015 12:27  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 16, 2015</time> by Baenki**
Pistachio commercial with Kerbals incoming.
"Jeb does it, with more boosters."
I found a worm in a pistachio once. Now I don't eat them anymore.

> 
> I found a worm in a pistachio once. Now I don't eat them anymore.

 And we need to know this because...

I followed the link in the text, and apparently it's named after [Kerman](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kerman#Economy), a city in Iran with a lot of pistachio production.

There's also a [Kerman](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kerman,_California) in California, but it's not related to pistachios.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-16T01:33:30Z" title="04/16/2015 01:33  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 16, 2015</time> by Pipcard**
![1280px-Kerman_2006.jpg](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/8/84/Kerman_2006.jpg/1280px-Kerman_2006.jpg)

> 
> (image of Kerman sign)

The sign is green!

KERBALS CONFIRMED!
Well that confirms it! Kerbals are absolutely **nuts!** ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

> 
> And we need to know this because...

I thought we were playing 6 Steps to Kevin Bacon.

> 
> I thought we were playing 6 Steps to **Kerman** Bacon.

Fixed that for you!
I actually drove through Kerman last week. Meh.

> 
> I actually drove through Kerman last week. Meh.

Did you see any green midgets?

Iran or U.S.?

mmmmmm bacon

wait! what?

[http://www.necrobones.net/screenshots/KSP/KSP%202014-10-16%2018-24-13-20.jpg](http://www.necrobones.net/screenshots/KSP/KSP%202014-10-16%2018-24-13-20.jpg)

> 
> Did you see any green midgets?
> Iran or U.S.?

Nope on the midgets. The US one - it's one of many towns in California's central valley. The nearest bustling metropolis is Fresno.

> 
> The nearest bustling metropolis is Fresno.

Never heard of it. But referring to Wikipedia I think it is probably the most hated city in the world.

*Raisin capital of the world*

Surely raisins are nothing like pistachios. Pistachios are awesome.

I actually like raisins... sometimes.

> 
> Surely raisins are nothing like pistachios. Pistachios are awesome.

Not when there's worms in them.

> 
> Not when there's worms in them.

You do realize that worms can be found in just about every agricultural product? You ever see an apple with a little hole in the side of it? Wormhole.

You toss the wormy ones and move on, or you won't ever eat fruit or vegetables again...

> 
> Not when there's worms in them.

"Worm" is just a shorter way of saying "free protein".

> 
> Well that confirms it! Kerbals are absolutely **nuts!** ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

Pecans and pistachios are only (a) little nuts.

> 
> Well that confirms it! Kerbals are absolutely **nuts!** ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

You have converted a "meh" day into a nice day for me. Thank You!
